TimelineContent.heroTitle: Ndimsuseli ovela e-England angoku entsha ezikweni ze-US/UK/EU kwiiAirBnb. Ndixoliswa nge-crypto, iimali zotsitso kunye nokusebenzisana ngesoftware. Ndine-background kwi-venture capital kunye nokusebenza.
TimelineContent.timeline2025Title: Ukuqalwa kwe-LiquidOps mainnet kunye nokuqinisekisa ukukhula
TimelineContent.timeline2025Description: Le nyaka ndaxhamile ixesha lam kukuqalisa [i-LiquidOps' mainnet](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1905268807746060790?s=20). Enye yeenfundo ezininzi ebalulekileyo endizifundile le nyaka kunene kukuba iziqalo azisoqala ngeproduct kuphela. Ukukhula kunye nemarketingi kunobuncinane (okanye kunobuncinane) kuba balulekile kakhulu njengoko iproduct, ngooko ndaqala [ukuqala imiqulu](/projects#content-creator) kunye nokuqinisekisa ukukhula.
TimelineContent.timeline2024Description: Ndafumene umqondo we-[LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops) kunye no-[Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer) olunyaka emva kokunyawo okufutshane okunobulumko eCambridge apho ndabekhona ngelo xesha. I-[AO](https://ao.arweave.net) yayikukuqaleni kwaye saqonda ngokukhawuleza amandla okusebenzisa i-liquidity yalaa nxalenye. Ndasebenza njengomdibaniso wobuchwane kwiAO Ventures (https://aoventures.io). Ndathandeka amaqela akwixesha kunye ndacima iindaba zomcimci wokuveza imivelaphi yokusuka kumkhondo wobuchwane, ndajonge ekugqibileni nokuya nomqondo wam omtsha - [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops).
TimelineContent.timeline2023Description: Ndaba ngumontu wokuqala ongaphandle kwi-[Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) ngokukhawuleza emva kwentsana yabo yeerhafu. Ndabuyelela i-[Wallety](/projects#wallety) igrant ukugxininisa ngokugqibeleleyo kwi-[Arweave](https://arweave.org) ecosystem. Ngexesha elelo ndakhile i-[Othent](/projects#othent), Oases kunye ne-[Subsidise.js](/projects#subsidisejs).
TimelineContent.timeline2022Title: Ndajoyina i-Community Labs kunye nokuzifounda ikhowudi
TimelineContent.timeline2022Description: Emva kokurealisa ukuba ukungenisa imali akwazinzelisanga kakhulu njengokwenza izinto, ndazama imkhondo yokufunda ukubhala ikhowudi kusukela phandle. Ndahlula ndahlula nokufunda ukubhala ikhowudi ngokukhawuleza kwaye ndakha iprojekti yam yokuqala i-[Wallety](/projects#wallety). Yayinzima kodwa yayinenkuthalo. Emva koko ndandibona ukunukunuka kwa-[Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) owasifundisa umhlobo oyilo-close kwaye ndathatha isigqibo sokujoyina kwaye kwi-[Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) njengomkela wabo wokuqala ongaphandle.
TimelineContent.timeline2021Description: Ndafumana umsebenzi ongaxakekishanyi kufanelu ye-crypto venture capital evela kueyomhlaba ukusuka ekusandiseleni. Ndasebenzi oonyanga ezi-3 aingaxakekishanyi ngaphandle kwokuba bathanda ukundilungiselela indawo yomdibaniso okhwandiwe, emva koko ndasebenzi kwiivenetshri zabo kunye nemali yobhaytsha ngezi- Unyaka omnye. Ndasetshenzisela ixesha lam ilizali okwenjenje le-due diligence kwi-dealflow, ndazicikwa emitingweni yabo yeviki ye-investment communitee kwaye ndaqhagamshelana nabamseli abafikile usuku lokuqinisekisa. Ngeli nyaka ndandizivalele njenge-[Polkadot Ambassador](https://polkadot.com/community/ambassador-program) apho ndathandeka ukwakhela umphakamani nondibene nemibutho ye-ecosystem namamseli.
TimelineContent.timeline2020Title: I-Crypto Teen kunye nokuhamba kuphangela i-drama school
TimelineContent.timeline2020Description: Ndisaziphumlela esikolweni se-drama ku-[Emil Dale Academy](https://www.emildale.co.uk), ndaqala i-Crypto TikTok yeskrami yethu eyayilungile ukufundisa uGen Z nge-Crypto. Ukuze ndingenele inisiyathibi ndathumela i-emali ngaphezu kwe-500 iinkampani, amafanelu okutsotsomela kunye neeprojekthi ekubuzisem akungaba kumsebenzi ngaphandle koxakekishanyo. Kulula kwe-over 500 emali ngaphezu kwe-6 kwenzela. Ndazuze ukunxibelelwa ku-Zoom emfuleni yentlekelelo ngeselfown yeshumi lokofela kunye nedata ekutheni ndathabalala iiklasi ukuze ndipapazele i-VCs namabishinisi ngokutsolokozela ukukundibhaya. Yayiyinto enobangela kweli xesha lentombazane yam kwaye ayikushiywa kutshitshwa nokushiywa. Le yye-unyaka ndandifumana iindigidi zokuzama isikolweni se-Drama ngokukhokela iimpahla zantsemdeni/izinto zokukhulula kwi-eBay ukubahlawule imali ye-khethazo emva kolwazi oluvela ku-Gary Vee, wayilungiselela!
TimelineContent.timeline2019Description: Ndjoyina umphakamani we-Ethereum ngo-2019 emva kokuqonda izinto zokuhlangana neqhomfa.
TimelineContent.timeline2017Description: Ndisaziphumlela ulwazi lwesikolo, abantu abambalwa babekuthemba iiswitini, ndim ndabesobenezo-fix sisikrini se-phone ngemali.
TimelineContent.timeline2026Description: Ngulo nyaka uLiquidOps wazuza [Astro](https://www.astrousd.com/), eyasekwa ngumntu omhle kodwa ndim [Kadar Sayed Abdi](https://x.com/0xKadar).

AngelPage.title: Utsitsirelo Lwe-Angel
introAndElevator: Ndiyathanda ukukhangela abamseli abalinganisela okwenza into ebaqonde ngokusebenza. Xa ndibone amandla kunye neendlela endinga zilungiselelo, ndiyelele nje ukuze ndibandakanywe ekusukwini.

Ndibhala iisheki phakathi kwe- **$500 kunye ne-$5,000** kwi-pre-seed kunye nokuthanda nokuqalwa kwezi-seed rounds. Ngamaphi andibhali iisheki ezikhulu, ndizama ukuba usebenzisanayo. Iyongeza izinxulumano, iingxelo zemkhiqizo, amacebiso emakulekile, okanye ibe umntu okusebenzisana naye nokuphinda-iphakamisa iingxaki, bona ngeenkcukacha ekugqibileni kwemigca engezantsi.

Ukuveza, ndike ndandi-founder okhusela kwaye ndiseplan ukuba okhusela okwenyani ngaxa ezayo, ke andikwazi uyalelisa ukunika ingqiqo ecala itsitsirelo yeenkampani. Ndiqiniseke kuphela ekutsitsirela iinkampani ezikhayo kumaphulamthi afanayo nokubo bendisebenzisana nazo, ke ndingarhoxa ukunika amacebiso. Sicela bona ngeenkcukacha ekugqibileni kwemigca engezantsi [angel investing disclosures](/disclosures).
helpItems: Andikwazi ukukunika iingcebiso zamalungelo / umthwalo, kodwa ndinokukukhomekela kwabo abafanelekileyo-iilawyer, imilinganiselo, kunye nabaprofeshinali (kwaye ndizokundifizela ukuba ungathathwa yi-scam kunye nemali ephakamileyo). De ngoku ndiye ndasusela iinkampani ezine ezinxulumene ne-UK kunye ne-Delaware C corporation.
Ndandilawula amaqela amancinci amancinci anelungile oku ngokukhawuleza
Ndiye ndasusela imali yokufumana ebenzi ngeZi-VCs, izikhululo, inzalo yezikali, kunye nokumfinyeza i-blockchain treasuries

Ndasetshenzise ziistritheri/VCs/iinkampani kunye nandi ibonele ipepala ibonele ilitilo, kuhlanganisa i-CEO, engineer, analyst, ndabekho kunye ne-COO intsingiselo kwaye ndabekho yi-private software contractor
Njengoko unokubona kwisayithi yam, ndi-SCRAPPY. Likhono olumuntu enkosi kwaye endinothando ukuze ndikuncede uyuphuhlisa / inarcishwa.
Ndilulisele umzonkathiso owayenee-thousands zokuqala kwaye wakhula kune-$55m kwimibuzo emtsshwam
Ndakhile / ndakhile / ndilulisele imikhiqizo engaphandle kwisitathi kunye nemfuneko ye-korporathi
Ndakhile iisheki ze-pitch, iipitshi, kunye nembono yenkampani ngesekusele kunye nengumbuki
pressureItems: Ndisombulule iziganeko ezithathu eziphakamileyo ngumphakamani okhusela mainnet DeFi
Ndibuzisela kwizikhulu ezintathu zokulinganisela ibhera ye-crypto
Ndaze ndiseba phambi kohamba / enxalenye yomphakamani kwaye ndaye ndandisethemba kwaye nandiphazamiswa ngokugqibeleleyo imiqulu
Ndiyothe inzuzo, indiliswe inzuzo, kunye nokususela iinkampani
Ndakhile amaqela kwaye nandithatha kwaye andidubula iilungu letemu
Ndiye ndasebenzi nabalinganiselo, iilawyer, abaphakamisi, kunye nemilinganiselo yemaketinji
Ndithe ndarhoxa iinkampani / abantu ngesekusele (ngawo onke amahora ndi-prefer iintombazane ezisisiwe)
Ndandidinga uku-creative ukuze ndisombulule iingxaki ezinobulumko, imvamvane kunye nomhlangano wezinto ezikhuluye
Ndandiyimela uku-1-1 amangelezi angeunyikelo kwaye nandiyazithandela imibalane emininzi
Ndiye ndandisanda kwaye nandilwa aqhubeka kunye ne-workplace kunye nabamseli abalinganisela abangaphandle
Ndisebenze kwii-company cultures ezimangalisayo, ndisebenzele emoyini, ndayakha oku kuhle, kwaye nandisombulula isakhono sendlu yam iinombolo
Emva kwemisebenzi eyeye ndinganye ndindidingaphandle. Ndinokukunceda ubukhanyi obunamnandi kwimikhiqizo yesosyal kunye neendumela zepitshi yehumusi
Ndiye ndibenezintandano ze-VC pitshi kunye noneye enziwa nangexoshanye
Ndiye ndasubana nongwanya-nkosi ondlulela ndibakhange ndibalwe
Ndibelkwe neqalelo lezintliziyo kunye nandibandakanywe kwii-hackathons (asikuthweli nokuqokelela umntu omnye, udlakele)
Ndiyazi indlela yokusengca imikhiqizo kunye nendlela yokusebenzisa izixhobo ezifana ne-Figma kunye ne-Webflow
AngelPage.mistakesTitle: Imaphutha Enkulu Endiye Ndayenza Endingakuthanda Ukukwenza
mistakesItems: Ndiye ndatshuma ekhaya kwe-$50k USD kwikwantu lokufumana umsebenzi olungiselela okuqinisekisiwe okwazi ukubakwa ngu-$5k
Ndiye ndatshuma u-$75k USD kuqikelelo lokupakisha umkhiqizo ongaxakekishanyi-umkhiqizo-umkhiqizo-umkhiqizo-umkhiqizo-umkhiqizo
Ndiye nditshume unyaka ekuthuthukiseni umkhiqizo kwaye andizigxininisele ngokugqibeleleyo ukukhula kunye nokuqala
Ndiye ndasusa umlamli woluselo oluyazisula onke amaphutha andikhileyo ayenze abantu ndiye ndahlangane ne--$26k kwi-isifo ye-neworth kunye nogweba ngokukhawuleza
Ndiye ndaphakamise ngokugqibeleleyo isikolo sokuqoqa indla yam nokuqokelela kunye nokuphakamisa
Ndiye ndalibalela ixabiso loluselo kunye nokuthuba obuzayo
Ndiye ndatshuma iimali ezilinganisiwe zemilinganiselo evela kwimaphutha engamathwesile asebenzisela isoftware engcono
Ndiye ndandisebenza kunye nokulahleka nokuba xenelege
AngelPage.astroDescription: I-Astro yenxunguphala amaphutha e-blockchain kwi-stablecoin issuer.
AngelPage.velaventuresDescription: I-Web3 venture studio engeniso yamapps ezifana ne-[Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com), [Vento](https://ventoswap.com/?tab=swap) kunye [AO Sync](https://github.com/vela-ventures/ao-sync-sdk).
AngelPage.upshotDescription: Isistemelo yamkeli-amkeli wetshomi ophakamileyo yokuqala, ekuthuthukiswe kwindlela ye-Base ecosystem.
AngelPage.saySoDescription: Umkhulu wokugqeba we-Web3 owakhelwe kwisistema ye-Sei blockchain.
AngelPage.plasmaOrbitalDescription: Inkampani yenkcubeko yenethiwekhi ye-microsatellite yokufumanela ulwandle.

content.content: Ipheji eli likwantu leecawa ezibalulekileyo zokutsolokozela imibutho yam. Sicela funda iintloko zengcaciso ngaphambi kokuqhagamshelana nam malunga nee-investment opportunities.
Imali Yocwaningo Kuphela

Nditsitsirela imali yam eyeyothini. Andilingani **kunyela** i-venture capital fund, andinasiphakamiseli **fund**, kwaye andiyamkeli imali evela kwii-limited partners (LPs) okanye nabangaphandle. Onke amasongelelo okutsolokozela enziwa endinye kuphela usebenzisa imali yam.
Ayilo Investment Advice

Akukho nto kowwebsite awume injongo njenge-investment, iilawyer, umthwalo, uxolo, okanye iingcebiso zebomi. Andinumuntu oxolelweyo okanye uxoliswa yi-Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) okanye nabangaphandle babalawuli. Onke amasongelelo okutsolokozela olwazi nini ngokwam.
Ayikho Umthwalo we-Fiduciary
Andinalo umthwalo we-fiduciary kwabamseli okanye iinkampani enditsitsirelo kuza ngaphandle kwayo ivela kulwazi lokutsolokozela. Ndingumsithatsi, hayi umlungiselela, umdibaniso, okanye i-fiduciary.
Ayilo i-Solicitation

Akukho nto kowwebsite eyenza umkelo, umkelo, okanye iingcebiso ukutsitsirela nenkampani, isikhamfuzo, okanye umkhiqizo wokutsolokozela. Nokho luwazi ngenkampani eportfoliyo yam yile kule njongo kuphela.
Akukho i-Guarantee yokutsolokozela
Okuqhagamshelana nam okanye okuzemukwa ipitshi yam **akukho** incwadi yokutsolokozela. Ndihlola amathuba ngesokela kwaye nditsitsirela amakompaniyeli ami (umhla kunene wokuqala okanye wokusecond).
Imali Elinganiselweyo

Ndike ndandindi-founder okhusela kunye ndiplan ukuba okhusela okwenyani ngaxa ezayo, ke andikwazi uyalelisa ukunika ingqiqo ecala itsitsirelo yeenkampani. Ndiqiniseke kuphela ekutsitsirela iinkampani ezikhayo kumaphulamthi afanayo nokubo bendisebenzisana nazo, ke ndingarhoxa ukunika amacebiso.
Ayikho Ukunxibelelana ne-Advisory

Andikunika amacebiso iinkampani okanye abamseli. Ndikholelwa ukuba abancedi bahlolisela ikhono (kuthi kutheni kwinenkampani enobugcisa) ‚Äî [bona uSteve Jobs achaze ukutheni](/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-c4CNB80SRc). Nditsitsirela kuphela kwabamseli kunye neemibono endiyathanda ukutsotsoloza nazo kwaye ndikholelwa ndinokunceda ukuzakha.
Ukugxininisa Kwi-Early Stage

Mhlawumbi andiyakuba usebenzisanayo kwabamseli besoko engeniselwa. Ndike ndiqalela ekusukwini kwaye ndinokugxininisa abantu okokuqala (ngaphambi kwe-Series A). Kodwa ukuba ube ngummseli wemvelaphi yobugcisa kwaye ukholelwa ukuba ndinokuba usebenzisanayo, ndizelele elingenabaxoxela.
I-Tax Considerations

Ayikho iingxabiso zemali ekuveza (ezilingana ne-SEIS okanye ne-EIS) enqakqaka kukulungile kunye nemithetho ye-HMRC. Sicela yuma iingcebiso ezizimeleyo zemali. Andinento ekuthshwele ngokuthembeka ngemvume yemali yokutsolokozela.
Ubuyobhobho

Ukuba udibanisa iintloko ezibuyobhobho kunye nam, ndizonxibela ngokunyamela, kodwa andikwazi ukuqinisekisa ubuyobhobho obugqibelele. Ndinokubanjwa ngababangela abolula imibuzo evela kwabamseli abalinganisela. Ungxolelani ukunambathelela iintloko ozingazithandi ukuphanula. Ukuba andizikwantu ezibhaliweyo zubuyobhobho kunye nam, andinalo umthwalo wokulindela iintloko ozithumela kum njenge-confidential.
I-Conflicts of Interest

Ndinokutsolokoza iinkampani eziphikisana enye nenenye okanye kunye neiinkampani uyenzayo. Andinolwazi lokuphanula ezinye imibuzo yendinzela, kwaye andinalo umthwalo wokulindela esikhathini somtsitsirelo kunye neenkampani eziphikisana.
I-Risk Warning

**Ukutsolokoza kwiinkampani ze-early-stage kunomngeni omkhulu. Unokuphosakala onke amaphutha akho. Okusebenzile emva ayililo inchuza yemvelaphi yezizazi. Amaxabiso e-investment anokushiywa phansi kunye nokukhwela. I-Early-stage investments ayinakushiywa kwaye unokungazi kusebenzela izandla zakho okuthwele iminyaka emininzi, ukuba yenzele.**

content.title: I-UK Investor Status
content.content: Ndilomntu ophakamile owenzenzele phantsi kwe-Financial Services and Markets Act 2000 (Financial Promotion) Order 2005. Ndilingane nokusiswe kahanjaniswa ebukhosini nokuva kwamweli emzuzwini wokunqoba imibuzo yolwazi kunye nemali ekuqinisekiseni imali yesithembu okunikezela imibuzo yokunye kule ndibandakanywa (njengomdibaniso weencazo zokuqalela koyalingqo-enye-eqalela imibuzo yolwazi.
content.note: **Kwabamseli:** Ngokwambuza imatha yokutsolokozela kunye nam, usiqinisekisa ukuba uyibandakanywe nge-ukugcina apho-akho engezantsi kwe-Financial Promotions regime kwaye usanda-umuntu kuthembeka ukuba ndingukulu ukuzivakalisa imatha eziphakalami. Ukuba ndixela umllungu ozinxulumbile ngaphambi kokuzemukwa ipitshi, ndikhululekele ukwenza.

content.content: Ukuba ine-imibuzo kuloo malunga nezifo, sicela unxibelelane kunye nam ku-hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Imvume kunye neMiqathango
Ngokunyuka kunye nokusebenzisa ilorimerjenkins.com (iSayithi), uvumelekile ukulungamenelaniswa yezi Miqathango yeService ("Imiqathango"). Ukuba ungavuni le Miqathango, sicela ungasebenzisi iSayithi.
Inkcazo yoService

I-Lorimerjenkins.com iseyisayithi yocwaningo olawulwa kwaye isilawulwa yiLorimer Jenkins. I-Sayithi ibonisa iintloko zomsebenzi wam, iiprojekthi, imibutho yokutsolokozela ye-angel, kunye nokwenye umxholo endikhethe ukukuthula.
Usebenzisa iSayithi
Ukulungele
Uvumelekile usebenzise iSayithi kuphela for lawful inkolo kwaye ngendlela eyazi ingxaki zangaphandle okanye ukuthintela ukulungela kwabo. Imibuzo eyalelwe inhaliso ngaphandle kwako:

items: Ukuzama ukufumana okusakwazayo emva kwe-Say okanye kumzi wayo
Umabandi ivirusi, i-malware, okanye enye amaphutha asaziyo
Usebenzisa izilungele zokusikela (iibhothi, izikhangeli) ngaphandle komvume
Ukuziphesha, ukubaka, okanye udlakela ezinye imibutho

content.content: Inyuka kuSayithi

Ndisisiko isikwama somhlalelo sokushintsha, sisikhwela, okanye kumthwalo umhlalelo ngakho nangaxa, ukulimita inyuka kwezinye izigaba zeSayithi, kunye nokutshaya abathi basebenzisa eyondabalala le Miqathango.
Intloko Yokutsolokozela ye-Angel

Aba nayela yokutsolokozela ye-angel iseyisayithi ibonisa njengealenye kuphela. Akukho nto kowwebsite eyenza nokutsolokozela iintloko, inkelo yokuthenga okanye ukuthengisa izikhamfuzo, okanye imibutho yemali, umlungiselela, i-uksolo, okanye ubuhle bemali. Sicela bona ami [angel investing disclosures](/disclosures) yokwazi izindle.
I-Intellectual Property

Ngaphandle kwe-noted, onke umxholo kowwebsite, ngaphandle koko okungu-text, imifanekiso, iigrafiki, imikhosi, iividiyo, kunye ne-code, yiyempahla kaLorimer Jenkins kunye ilindwe-copyrighte, otrateki, kunye ne-intellectual property elungilekileyo.

Ukunikezela inkosi emvelweni, eyingekithi eyodidi emvelweni, ukuba usebenzise iSayithi kwitangelo ethi omuntu kunye neelona ekuzinikezela. Ungatholakala kunqoba, ulwazi oluzinikezela okanye unibhalike iSayithi umxholo ngaphandle komvume, kulungisa okanye ukusisela izisebenza enziweyo, usebenzise iSayithi umxholo weelona ezengalelweni, okanye ususa umkhuzo we-copyright okanye izazintle zempahla kumxholo.
Ukufaka Komuntu Kunye nokuQhagamshelana

Ukuba ufaka idwebo, iplan yenkampani, okanye elonye ulwazi kunye nam malunga nee-investment opportunities kunye notsolokozela: uziyoba ngumnikaki wempahla yakho, undinika into engazimeleyo yokuba ndibuyele kunye nokuhlalasela impahla yakho, andinalo umthwalo wokuzimangala okanye ukutsolokozela, ndinokufumana imibuzo efanayo kwamanye amandla, kunye unozibila imali yakho ubuyobhobho.
Izixhobo Zangaphandle

ISayithi inokumba ilingano kumhlalelo wangaphandle okanye amandla aphandle. Ezi zixhobo zizonke njengezinxanxasi kuphela. Andinalo umthwalo womxholo, ukunikethi, okanye inkoko yemhlalelo yangaphandle, ayikho amaphutha avela ekusebenziseni amantu angaphandle, okanye inyuka yangaphandle.
Inkcazo Yengenakuqiniseka

**ISAYITHI IBONAKALA NJENGE 'NJENGE' KUNYE NE 'NJENGE' ANGAPHANDLE KWAMAKWANTU AYELI**, ngaphandle nokungelwe, kunye nangaphandle kwe-inkcazo yokuthengisa, ukunikethi kwiintlanga ezitile, ukuba iSayithi ibe ngumuntu engazithethelelwayo, eyokengelekayo, okanye eyangaxakileyo, okanye ngeelona zokuqonda, ukuthembeka, okanye ukulungela umxholo.
Umthwalo Olimithi

**KUMAWA OLUNENE OLUVUMELWA YILWAZI, LORIMER JENKINS AYILWAZI AWABE ANOBULUMKO OKUTHI NGENYE** inyaka eyonzileyo, eyonzileyo ekhethekileyo, eyonzileyo enzekela, okanye eyonzileyo entlungu, uku-libhulela, inyulo, idatha, okanye ukulungela, amaphutha avela ekusebenziseni iSayithi, amaphutha okutsolokozela, okanye amaphutha avela ekuthembakeni kulwazi loluSayithi.
Oku kumicelela apho kuqalo italibu kunye noma endixele nge-ambagali ye-amandla azofunda amandla. **Akukho nto emva kumhla wethu nje ayaba neembali ngaphandle kwenani ozizame (oku kulungile).**
Indemnithi

Uvumelekile ukunika ubale, ukunikela, kunye nokubala Lorimer Jenkins evela elingalingeni elilungu, amaphutha, amakhulukelelo, ukunikethi, kunye nemali avela ekusebenziseni iSayithi, ukulunga le Miqathango, ukulunga ayeli eliphanele elambilenge, ayikho imibuzo oyenza, okanye okunye oku.
Ubuyobhobho
Usebenzisa iSayithi kubaliswa kwaye nam [Privacy Policy](/privacy), eyonxibelelweyo kumwe le Miqathango.
Izinto Ekushintshwa kwe-Miqathango

Ndisisiko isikwama iMiqathango ngakho nangaxa. Izinto ziyakuba yindawo ngithuba lwama-post kunye ne "Last Updated" inombolo eyandisiwa. Usebenzisa iSayithi emva koshintshwa kunye nomkelo yalaa Miqathango eyandisiwa.
Umlandu weEngilandi

Le Miqathango iyabaliswa kwaye ihlanganiswe kommelwazi welisabelo ne-England kunye neWales. Ayeli alulungulelweyo asiyakuxazulula kukhayo uthembeka, kwaye ukuba eyonziba, iinkhotela yeEngland kunye neWales iyakuba nezikhundla zentlungelo excluzibhe.
I-Severability
Ukuba ayeli alilungu ley Miqathango esizolungulelweyo okanye engavumulekileyo, azinye imibuzo iyakuqhubeka kumandla anele kunye nomsebenzi.
Okuxhagamshelana Nam
Ukuba ine-imibuzo malunga ne-Miqathango, sicela unxibelelane kunye nam ku-hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Ngokusebenzisa iSayithi, ubonakala ukuba ufunde, ukuqonda, kunye ubvumelane nokulingana kule Miqathango yeService.
Iphelikelo

Wamkelekile ku-lorimerjenkins.com (iSayithi). Ley Ipolisi Yabuyobhobho ichaza indlela Lorimer Jenkins ("ndim," "ami," okanye "ayam") ifumana, isebenziaye, kunye nokubala ulwazi xa unxibelelana nolosayithi.
Ulwazi Endifumeneyo
Ulwazi Olujongwe Okukuqala
Xa unyuka kuSayithi, ndifumana iintloko ezezona ngokukhawuleza kuGoogle Analytics, kuqalo:

items: Amapheji usebenzisazo kunye nexesha elitelweyo ephejini lolungu

content.content: Ulwazi Oproposezo
Okwangoku, iSayithi ayifumana ulwazi olulayowaza lomntu ngokukhawuleza evela kumuntu ngokukhawuleza kuformula okanye iiakhaweuncti, kunye nalenzeno einamathelo:

**I-Angel Investing Enquiries:** Ukuba unxibelelana kunye nam malunga nee-investment opportunities kukhusela i-emali, ndinokufumana kunye nokugcinela ulwazi olukhethilweyo, ngaphandle kwamagama akho, iyodileisi, intloko yenkampani, imikhiqizo yepitshi, kunye nengaphandle kulwazi okwenye okumisiweyo kwimibuzo yako okwambuzo.
Indlela Endisebenzisa Ulwazi Lwako

Ndisebenzisa ulwazi olujongwe ngokukhawuleza kuGoogle Analytics kukunizipha indlela abanti basebenzisa iSayithi, iphuhliso lwumxholo kunye nokusebenzisa, isihlalelo lesithwandiso lentuthuko, kunye nokusebenzisa iSayithi.

Ndisebenzisa ulwazi olusiwezo kukhusela i-emali yokutsolokozela ye-angel ukuhlalasela ee-investment opportunities, ukuqhagamshelana nabamseli, kunye nokugcinela irekwodi yokumbuzo okuhlobene nokutsolokozela.
I-Google Analytics

Isayithi isebenzisa i-Google Analytics, isevisi yohlahlaselo lwesikhuseli esibonelwe yiGoogle LLC. I-Google Analytics isebenzisa iikuki ukuze incedise ukuhlalasela indlela abanti basebenziayo iSayithi. Kokunxulumeneyo nolwazi olusebenziswa yiGoogle, sicela ubaleke: [Privacy Policy kaGoogle](https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites)
Ukuyalela

Unokuyalela i-Google Analytics nangokufakela i-[Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on](https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout) okanye ngokuhlalasela izitlhalelo zakho zecayi ukuze unqobe okanye udlule iikuki.
Iikuki

I-Cookies ziyiyinto encinane yuteksti esigcinweyo kwisikwantu sakho. Isayithi isebenzisa iikuki kuphela kuGoogle Analytics kwimigqo ekutshweleyo. Unokupapela ukunqoba iikuki ngokukhawuleza izitlhalelo zakho zecayi.
Ugcinelo Lwedatha

Ulwazi lwe-Google Analytics lujongwe okwenyanga ezingamashumi amabini kunye nexesha, emva koko liyakusulwa ngokukhawuleza. Ulwazi oluronelweyo kukhusela i-emali yokutsolokozela ye-angel lujongwe okwexesha elingalinganiselwe okanye njengoko kusekwe yilwazi.
I-Angel Investing Communications
Ukuba uthumela imatha yepitshi okanye elonye ulwazi olunokunxulumene nokutsolokozela:

items: Ndinokwenza ulwazi kunye nabancedi basebenzisanayo ekutheni andiphinda alinganiselwe
Andinathengisa okanye unxibila ulwazi lwako kwabatshotshi abalinganisela bethemba

content.content: Ilingano Lezixhobo
Isayithi inokumba ilingano kumhlalelo wangaphandle. Andinalo umthwalo womzuzuko yesikali sangaphandle. Ndidumela ukuba ubuyele ipolisi yabuyobhobho yazabo.
Ayeli Akho

Kunokothi kuze kube ngolandelela, unokuba namayeli malunga nedatha yakho, kuqalo iyo-access kulwazi endiziyoba, imbuzo yokurhoxwa kwedatha yakho, object kwi-processing, kunye portability yedatha. Ukuze usebenzise ayeli, sicela unxibelelane kunye nam ku-hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Kwabakhetulwa be-EU (GDPR)

Ukuba ukhona kwi-European Union, unayo ayeli aninzi kwiGeneral Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Isizalelethi sokusakela idatha yakho yile owethemba okusukela kuwumzuzuko wokushintsha kunye nokusebenzisa iSayithi, kunye kwabakhetulwa be-angel investing, owethemba okusukela kuwumzuzuko wokuhlalasela ee-investment opportunities.
Kwabakhetulwa beCalifornia (CCPA)
Ukuba umntu weCalifornia, unayo ayeli kukalulo kwi-California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), kuqalo iyo-kuhlanganiswe ulwazi olulayowaza lamntu kunye nombuzo wokurhoxwa kwedatha.
Ubuyobhobho bwabantwana

Le Sayithi ayasetyenziswe kwabatingane abalinganiselwe kungu-18 iminyaka. Andinaxakumani ngokuba ufumene imibuzo yolwazi lyomntu kubantwana abangaphansi kwe-18. Ukuba uyakholelwa ukuba ndigcinile imibuzo enjalo, sicela unxibelelane kunye nam ukuze irhoxwe.
Izinto Ekushintshwa kule Polisi
Ndinokubuyela ley Polisi Yabuyobhobho okwenyanga nokunyanga. Ayeli alulungu ayaza kumise kulipheji eli kunye ne "Last Updated" inombolo eyandisiwa.
I-Security
Ndizama ukubala imibuzo yakho, akukho ndlela yosebenziso kwiinternet eyifumene i-100% i-secure. Andikwazi ukuqinisekisa i-security eperfect yedatha ethunyelweyo okanye esigcinwe ku-Sayithi.
Okuxhagamshelana Nam
Ukuba ine-imibuzo malunga ley Polisi Yabuyobhobho, sicela unxibelelane kunye nam ku-hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Ngokusebenzisa le Sayithi, uvumelekile okuungena ulwazi kunye nokusebenzisa ulwazi njengoko kutshweleyo kwile Polisi Yabuyobhobho.

ProjectsPage.title: Iiprojekthi
ProjectsPage.roleAstro: CEO emva kokuthatha, kwaye agent eangona-seeds
ProjectsPage.walletyDescription: I-[Polkadot](https://polkadot.com) & [Kusama](https://kusama.network/) ecosystem analytics website, enolwazi lokubonisa abasebenzisi i-analytics elusapela ngezikhundla zabo ezinjengo-spending, monthly usuage, CSV exporting kunye nemali ehlawulwe kumaphepha amanethiwekhi. Ndikhokele iigrantu ezimbini kwi-[Kusama DAO](https://dune.com/substrate/kusama-gov), ezabuye zaphiwo emva kokuba ndifuna ukudityaniswa ne-[Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com/).
ProjectsPage.othentDescription: Inhlalelo ye-[Othent](https://othent.io) yayilungile ukunika abantu abaninzi abelinganisela ukutsotsoloza iiprojekthi ze-blockchain, ngaphandle kokusebenzisa izikhamfuzo zokucwanga ezimponjwani kwaye endisebenzise ayeli asexabini-oauth kanye neGoogle. Ndafakela iprojekthi njengomuntu wokuqala ongaphandle ongcotshwe ngaphakameli kwi-[Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), inkampani yosembenzelo eyenziweyo yiTate Berenbaum (https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) kwi-[Arweave](https://arweave.org) ecosystem. [Othent](https://othent.io) waqhubekele ukunikwa yi-[Wander](https://wander.app) enikezwaziyo yentlobo yemotho, i-[Arweave](https://arweave.org) & [AO](https://ao.arweave.net) ecosystem I-Web3 isikhuseli esinobugcisa olungu-50,000 abantu, okwenze ibe yi-[Wander Connect](https://www.wander.app/connect).
ProjectsPage.liquidOpsDescription: I-lending kunye ne-borrowing protocol eyenziwe ku-[AO](https://ao.arweave.net), enolwazi lokukhuphela i-$400m ayinani ye-[Arweave](https://arweave.org) tokens value. Ndisiqalo samaculo iprojekthi kunye no-[Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer), ndaba yokuqala i-Fellow led company ekhuphulwe kwi-[Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), ndathathe izinkulungwane ze-[waitlist](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1863863983498805473?s=20) signups ezakhekelela ku-$55m soft-commits yomgciphelo kunye ne-on-chain fund verification, [ipitshwe](https://x.com/aoTheVentures/status/1813676139795374171?s=20) kwi-[AO Ventures](https://www.aoventures.io) demo day emva koko yamukelwa [$325k pre-seed round](https://www.ibtimes.co.uk/revolutionizing-defi-how-lorimer-jenkins-marton-lederer-are-transforming-arweave-liquidops-1729945). Siluqalise i-mainnet, sine-numerious intergrations kubandakanya i-AO Chrome/IOS/Andriod wallets [Wander](https://wander.app) ([demo apha](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ODxijaC0Dc)) & [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com) ([demo apha](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GeQ01-rBUPQ&t=11s)). Sikwanele kwaye sipasse audits ngamafama e-[Spearbit](https://cantina.xyz/solutions/spearbit) & [Quantstamp](https://quantstamp.com/).
ProjectsPage.contentCreationDescription: Ndivelisa umxholo wevidiyo kuzo zonke iplatiphormu ezinkulu zokuxhumana. Injongo yam yile ukuba ibe yindlela entle yokwakha uluntu lwam lwintanethi, ukubonisa umhlaba ukuba ndenza ntoni kwaye ukuntsoma abantu abaninzi kwiindawo ezintsha. Ndiqalise nangokupela ipodcast ebizwa [Lorimer's Podcast](/#podcast).
ProjectsPage.cryptoTeenDescription: [Crypto Teen](https://www.tiktok.com/@lorimer__jenkins) yiliso le-cryptocurrency TikTok elilungile ukufundisa uGen Z nge-crypto, ikhomba izinto eziyintloko kunye neenkcukacha kwi-Web3 blockchain ilanga.
ProjectsPage.subsidisejsDescription: I-Subsidise JS yipaki eyakhiye ukwenza i-[Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) izikhamfuzo ukuba isiqingisele imibuzo okwangaphandle kunye neya bayalelisa umthetho wemvume yabantu ngokusebenziswayo i-[ANS-102](https://github.com/ArweaveTeam/arweave-standards/blob/master/ans/ANS-102.md) iArweave network standard. Ndiplani ukuqa okwakhatshiswayo kwezinye iiprojekthi enizafuna okulindela i-gas ee-upload zabo, eliza kunxibisela abuntu abangalusuli agabanga i-AR tokens ukuze kukhusele i-Web 2 consumer app ekuthuthukiswe kwi-Arweave.
ProjectsPage.astroDescription: I-Astro ilixabiso lokuhlehlela olwakhe nokongeza kwiintlanga ze-Web3. Ngokuhlanganisa iistabilocoin ezininzi kunye neempawu yemali muni kunye neyinye, isikhamfuzo - USDA, i-Astro yaqinisekisa ububela obungaphandle ebunxulumeneyo phakathi kwempilo umhlaba kunye ne-on-chain applications.
ProjectsPage.coolarweaveaddressDescription: Irepositolio eli izokunike indlela yokukhela ongaphandle kwe-[Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) ukufumana isikhuseli kunye nesikhamfuzo esikukwazi. I-Claude iyakuqonda okukukwazi ikhuselo ukusuka kumgcino wakho owathandekayo umgcino.
ProjectsPage.aothecomputerDescription: Umntu wam wamkhulelisa ingoma yokunotshintsho lwesizinda esihlawulelwe kakhulu ngentengo encinci, ndavuyiswa (kunye nokufuna kuqala) kwaye andinakukumisela okokufumaneka okuhle akazifumene. Ngooko ndaqala kusinto kwi-Namecheap ukubona iintlanga ezinye ezininzi zokufumaneka okuhle. Kuvele ukuba [AO The Computer .com](https://aothecomputer.com) yayilungile ukuthenga nge-$11.48 ngowaka, thatha oko [redacted] üòú.
ProjectsPage.aohtmlDescription: AO HTML sisixhobo esikuvumela ukuqalisa iwebhusayithi ngokusebenzisa ifayili yeHTML efemekazi ngokusiseko ngomxholo ohlengalelwa ku-AO network ngenkqubo. Qonda iwebhusayithi ekwangqinelene nenqobo entlalwini nemigcinane yeqela yangaphandle njengika-DAO, ngumzekelo iwebhusayithi yaya ukuziphuhlisa emva kokuba inemosyon ka-DAO yamkelwe kunye nomntu omninzi weWeb2 eVercel/Netlify ayatitshona kusetyenziswa le script.

WritingPage.title: Isicatshulwa
WritingPage.substackSignup: Joyina ukuze ufumane ibhulogi ezitsha ngokuya ngethuba.

BookshelfPage.title: Ikhona leencwadi
BookshelfPage.subtitle: Iincwadi eziye zandinceda kumthetho wam
BookshelfPage.richDadPoorDadNotes: Okwamhlophe ekusukela kwi-financial literacy kunye kubaluleka kokuba imali kubaluleka kubaluleka.
BookshelfPage.1984Notes: Incwadi ye-distopian eya ezindlela kunye enokubuyekeza enosiba ngolusundu ukufika ngumhlaka.
BookshelfPage.zeroToOneNotes: Ibonela abamseli kumqathango wokubakha i-monopoly kunye nokusisela inxabiso ngokubuzisela umqondo owenye ukufumana amandla amacala, ukusuka kumuntu omnye, kunye nokubakha iinkampani ezinobugcisa.
BookshelfPage.hardThingNotes: Iingcebiso ezimbizaya ngocwaningo oluzao kunye nokuthutha iskola. Akukho kuqikelela, kuphela okusebenzile.
BookshelfPage.whatYouDoNotes: Izihlalelo zesisiso ekuthuthukiswe ikuluthi ngentlalo ye-isithembu kukhulula kwaye kuze kube Genghis Khan.
BookshelfPage.spareNotes: Intlolwazi ewazi ngokusebenzela intlikosidodwane kunye nokucingelela oku kuthathwa kwilizali engubangubanga.
BookshelfPage.riseAndFallNotes: Intlolwazi ethathwe kulowazi kwecembu kwezintona kunye nosarah ferguson, kusukela kucebezo yabo kweli xesha lamanje.

About.description: Ndim umthemeli ovela e-England, ngoku ndingqubela phambili endaweni ezahlukeneyo e-US/UK/EU nge-AirBnb's. Ndilonwabiswa ngukriptocurrency, izikhululo kunye nophuhliso lwesoftware. Ndine-background kuvenkile yezimali kunye nokusebenza. Ndiyi-content creator futhi ndisebenzisa ipodcasti ebizwa nge-[Lorimer's Podcast](/#podcast).

Podcast.title: Lorimer's Podcast
Podcast.description: Mamela eZikhokelo zam zezingxoxo ezinzulu kunye nabaveli, abantu abatshintsha imali, kunye nabakhi basesistemeni yokuqala. Ndixoxa iimba ezisemva kwemigomo, izifundo ezafundwe, kunye nentliziyosesosyo yeteknoloji ezahlukeneyo.

SubstackSignup.title: Bazi lula ngokukhawuleza
SubstackSignup.description: Joyina inewsletter yam ukuze ufumane amaposi ablog amsha ethe ngqo kwi-inbox yakho. Ndibhala malunga ne-startups, i-crypto, ukwakha ngPublic kunye nemifundiso eyafunyanwa kwisenzo sam njengomthathi-nxaxheba.

FAQ.title: Imibuzo Ebuziwa Rhoqo
FAQ.a1: Ndim umuntu osiseko yeLiquidOps, iprotokoli yokukweboleka kunye nokukweboleka kwii-pondo kunye ne-AO. Ndiphinda ndibuyisele imali kwi-startups ezisandul' ukuqala kwaye ndiyenza umxholo ngamaStartup, i-crypto, kunye nokwakha ngokusiswa.
FAQ.q2: Uyakwazi na ukusebenza kuconsulting okanye umsebenzi wokubonelela amacebiso?
FAQ.a2: Andikwazi umsebenzi wokubonelela amacebiso kuba ndikholelwa ukuba abantu abonelela amacebiso abahlali benyaniswa. Ndicinga ukuba kuthe cwaka ukubuye imali kwii-startups.
FAQ.a3: Ndithumele i-imeyile kule [heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com](mailto:heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com) enobunjani becebo lakho. Ngokuqhelene ndibuyisela imali $500-$5,000 kumkeli oziswa kwingxelo ezinomthwalo osinzile kwiinkampani ezakha kwizinto endinokuqonda kuzo.
FAQ.a4: Ndisebenzisa ngokuyintloko i-TypeScript, i-React, i-Next.js, kunye neempilo zekloko ezibandakanya i-Arweave kunye ne-AO. Ndiyumuntu ozifundele ukuba ndibe umxangi wokupheleleyo.
FAQ.a5: Ndisoloko ndilindela ukuthetha nabantu abamdumiswa, abayiliseli, kunye nabantu abakha. Qhagamshelana neyimeyile kule [heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com](mailto:heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com) enentetho engcono malunga nentloni yakho kunye nento oyamkelayo ukuyixoxa.

FilmsPage.title: Iifilimu & Itelevisheni
FilmsPage.subtitle: Idayari yam yokuba ndibhale ngeiifilimu nethelevishenni
FilmsPage.marginCallDescription: Umcimbi okubulisayo owenzeka kwisikhumbuzo se-24 amaora kwibhanki yokutyala eWall Street ngokusiswa kwenziwa yenziwa ye-2008.
FilmsPage.theBigShortDescription: Isikhalo esithandwa ngumcimbi esibalisa ibali eliqinisekiselweyo labantu abathe baqikela kwaye benza inzuzo ngokuvala komqolo wamashumi ayintethu ka-2008.
FilmsPage.theWolfOfWallStreetDescription: Ibali elingaqhelekanga langempela lithi lingenxa kaJordan Belfort, umthengisi wamasheri owakhohlisa abantu bembali ngemilyoni apha aphila ubomi bukhukhula.
FilmsPage.billionsDescription: Intlekelo ephakamiselweyo malunga nomphathi webhange elicela imali ongenasizathu olubhukuqwe kulwandle nalwazi lolawulo lwesaziso.
FilmsPage.goldDescription: Okukhokelwe zinto eqala, umlobi wezinto anokwazi ngobunjineli ubambisane uphumzele umboni ekukhangela igold kwisiqithi seIndonesia, ekhokelela kwisikali esikulu somkelo.
FilmsPage.warDogsDescription: Amanqwenela amabini asebenzise ukulandelela lwerhulumente ube yiisifundo zezikhali zomhlaba jikelele, okukhokelwe ngesikhalo esingenakulindelekwa.
FilmsPage.uncutGemsDescription: Umuntu othanda udayimane kwiDiamond District yeNew York ubenza imibaniso yeenqwelo ezinkulu yokuqala ekuthwalelanweni nendima yezesikolo zokuguqula.
FilmsPage.catchMeIfYouCanDescription: Ibali eliqinisekiselweyo likafrank Abagnale Jr., umuntu owaziyo enempi ebalekayo owakwazi nokuqoka inkosi, ogogqela, nolawlo ‚Äî konke kwisigxina sekumnine unyaka.
FilmsPage.wecrashedDescription: Ukuqala kunye nokufa komgangatho akaWeWork kunye nomuntu othando umuntu oyindlwa ophakamisela kodwa ongaziyo umuntu othando kuAdam Neumann.
FilmsPage.djangoUnchainedDescription: Umuntu owangena ngaphandle kwesigulelo abanzi abambisane nomvelinqangi wezinto ebalekayo ukunqabela umfazi wakhe kumuntu onobusikela.
FilmsPage.pulpFictionDescription: Izibali ezinxulumene zimicimbi eyonge kwaye ubufefele kwiLos Angeles, ezitshalwe ngesikali sendesikali seqanda likaTarantino.
FilmsPage.inglouriousBasterdsDescription: Iqela labasoldiers beJudea-America izidenge ukubulala abakhokaneli beNazi ekukhangeni kofrance inxusa yeMali yeSecond.
FilmsPage.kidulthoodDescription: Ibukiwe okungenukela kwaye nokwenzela isapho ebabelu iwara ezikhiyani zozama kunye nabatsha beWest London.
FilmsPage.adulthoodDescription: Iminyaka eli-enem nje emva kwisiqalo sikubizwa Kidulthood, uSam ubhekisiwe kuhlalelwa akumele akalamane nemibuzo yesikali sakhe.
FilmsPage.brotherhoodDescription: Isiphumo sokuqala kwintluthe-nkampani ifowunu uSam ekubeka umkhondo wakhe emuva abantu besikali babuyela.
FilmsPage.riseOfTheFootsoldierDescription: Ibali elibulisayo eliqinisekiselweyo lokuvela kwethukhela lobhatane edlalweni yentando yeEssex kwiimbangi ze-1980 ne-1990.
FilmsPage.topBoySummerhouseDescription: Iqela leChannel 4 lilandela abathengi bezidakamizela esithutheliseleni isikali seHackney eEast London.
FilmsPage.topBoyDescription: Ukusindwa kweNetflix kuqhubeka ibali likaDushane noSully njengoko banikezela ekubuyela kwimvume yawo kusithubelezi samachiza seeLondon.
FilmsPage.peakyBlindersDescription: Ibali esikhwama sobugebenga linjeniso kumashumi amane ewama-1920 kumuntu wakhe weshaleng ovelwa kwisithwandwe seShelbies.
FilmsPage.snatchDescription: Inxulumano elibinikeleli yebugebenga beeLondon, abafakeli bequndo oluthathu, kunye nedayimane ebalekayo eqhubela kwimfihlelo emaxolweni.
FilmsPage.lockStockAndTwoSmokingBarrelsDescription: Amantombazane amanye akaEast End aqatywa kumkhondo womcimbi emva kwequndo elincazo lesikali elichumile ibhaluwe.
FilmsPage.breakingBadDescription: Umfundi wokuzibala otyilo esomni okunqoba ibhangi yokhankanyelo ngokulandela umtwane azibele umgula onqoba umzimba.
FilmsPage.betterCallSaulDescription: Isikhalo esingaphambi kuBreaking Bad lifowunu usiJimmy McGill ephakamiselweyo ngamanqwanqwa amangela ngokuya kuSaul Goodman.
FilmsPage.elCaminoABreakingBadMovieDescription: Emva kwesiqalo seBreaking Bad, uJesse Pinkman uyabaleka kumkhondo wakhe awuthwalelanwe ukuqala ubomi obusha.
FilmsPage.interstellarDescription: Iqela labavubusi bathwala ngechibi likasizani ukuze bakhangelekele amalwandle amintsi njengomhlaba ubhukuqwe ngumilambo weenguqulelo.
FilmsPage.parasiteDescription: Usapho olwaneleyo lusebenzisa amanqwelo ukuze lungene kuhlalelwa umuntu othanda, kunye nokufa okumnyama kwaye nomcimbi oselula.
FilmsPage.blackMirrorDescription: Ipobanduku yeemahlakelo yendawo ezixakaxakile ukuqhathanisa umrwele weqoqosho kunye nenkxaso yalo kumuntu ongulungu.
FilmsPage.oblivionDescription: Kumhlaba owange-apocalyptic, umntu ophakamiselweyo esamkelo sendlu iyanuka enqwela yomlilo eqhutywa isixhobo esamkelo.
FilmsPage.exMachinaDescription: Umuntu otsha okufumanekela ikhompiyutha okusokwe ukuzamkela isiyezi elithandiswa isixhobo sokuzama amanqwelo bentu.
FilmsPage.iAmMotherDescription: Intombazane eyazalwa yirobhothi ekubukweni echithini iyabuza umhlaba wakhe ngomntu oufika.
FilmsPage.snowpiercerDescription: Kumhlaba ogolide-golide ogu-apocalyptic, abatsha bashiyekile bahlale ebusulwini beqande elinqwela elinqwelo linxulumene ngokuhlukana.
FilmsPage.getOutDescription: Umuntu omnyama omtsha uza kuhlalelwa umuntu omhlophe, apho izinto eziyiba ngentla zichazela umlokelele onobusikela.
FilmsPage.prisonersDescription: Abantwazana bawembili abalele, utathathe umuntu othanda akuzama ukunxiba apho ipolisa iyalandela umcimbi.
FilmsPage.birdBoxDescription: Umuntu nentombazane zakhe bahlala ngemigqiriko yabo kuye bakhuphuke umlambo ongonakaliyo ukusuka kwizixhobo ezibulisayo.
FilmsPage.thePlatformDescription: Kumtolampilo okwedlulisa abantu okulula, abatshintshi bahlala nokuziphakamisela kunye nenye kunye nokuthenga.
FilmsPage.thePlatform2Description: Iqela lamadoda amasha aliphangela umtolampilo owedlulisayo, ngawo ngawo amithetho emibi eyenza umzekelo onzima.
FilmsPage.glassOnionAKnivesOutMysteryDescription: Umuntu otsha olwaziyo uBenoit Blanc ubungene kwitshona eliyeyeni yomntu othanda ikhompiyutha ukunxulumana nokuchasene neqanda.
FilmsPage.dontLookUpDescription: Abachwantshi bamabini basikwela ikhomethi ekunqoba umhlaba kodwa bakuhambane ukuqina umhlaba ongonakaliyo.
FilmsPage.thePerksOfBeingAWallflowerDescription: Umuntu okunqaba olukhethekileyo umbala intsipa yomntwana malunga nabantu abamkhethileyo.
FilmsPage.titanicDescription: Intombazane ye-seventeen imemeza umuntu onobusikela enqelandeni yeR.M.S. Titanic elendlwana.
FilmsPage.thePursuitOfHappynessDescription: Ibali elishukela kuthanda likaSom Gardner, umuntu othanda ibhanki owade ase-outside apha anomntwana kethu kwaye alinqoba ibhanki.
FilmsPage.theBoyInTheStripedPyjamasDescription: Indlela ebalulekile yobuntu obufananwe ngumuntu okulwa noSiyoni kwakhe kunye nomona ababhala Imbumbe.
FilmsPage.jokerDescription: Umuntu otsha othwala akhangelela umgula ubusikela akhangelela iBhagade yeGotham City okunobusikela.
FilmsPage.theIrishmanDescription: Umuntu othanda umcimbi ubukela ubomi bakhe bomcimbi, inxulumano nabugebenga beBuffalino, kunye nokubaleka kuJimmy Hoffa.
FilmsPage.forrestGumpDescription: Umuntu othanda umuntu ondenene izikhalo ezininzi zentlalo yesixhumi amashumi amathathu ewama-1900 eAmerika.
FilmsPage.theQueensGambitDescription: Intombazane ezalekile emtala isikali akhangelela inzila yematshe encotheni yabadlali bensikali ewama-Cold War.
FilmsPage.babyReindeerDescription: Umuntu othanda izikali ubuye abulele ngomntu onothando umfazi ekubeni aphakamisela kwisikali esibulisayo.
FilmsPage.dexterDescription: Umuntu othanda umthi womsindo unqoba igqirela imfihlo yokufa ngobuntu othanda abaqulathi.
FilmsPage.tigerKingDescription: Ibali elingathandekanga eliqinisekiselweyo likavela Joe Exotic, umuntu othanda izilwanyana abanqoba inxulumano yecinema.
FilmsPage.jimmySavileABritishHorrorStoryDescriptio: Isialathiso esibulisayo esichazela umuntu umilandi wezinto ezenzakalisayo apho acithe isikhalo ekusithwala ngeqanda.
FilmsPage.hitlerTheRiseOfEvilDescription: Ibali elinambili likuqala kwesikali seAdolf Hitler nemvula yakhe kangangoko kumuntu othanda umhlaba.
FilmsPage.squidGameDescription: Amakhulu abantu abanokushiye kwimali wamukela imibaniso yokuzibala izikali zabantwana ngenxa yezikali.
FilmsPage.theExpendablesDescription: Iqela lezixhobo lentshukumo liyokunqoba ubugebenga obubulisayo beemele-sente.
FilmsPage.theExpendables2Description: Iqela lezixhobo liyabuyela ekuhlaleni okushiyekileyo ekhokelela kwisikali sokubanga.
FilmsPage.theExpendables3Description: UBarney Ross uqoca iqela lamadoda amasha abugebenga okukunqoba owomthandi welapa.
FilmsPage.avengersEndgameDescription: AveAvengers aqhubeka nesikhalo sokugqibela ukuqalwa kwesikimu seThanos kunye nokuzama amalwandle.
FilmsPage.angelHasFallenDescription: Umuntu othanda ipolisa uMike Banning unanzeliswe lokubulela iNkosikazi eNkosi akumele akuzama akubonisa.
FilmsPage.londonHasFallenDescription: Abakhokaneli bomhlaba bezicelo kubuqhikali bemilungiselo ekumele uMike Banning akalamane neNkosi eEurope.
FilmsPage.jurassicWorldDescription: Ipaki yezilandelani esenela izixhobo zicale zonke emzameni oziphelelisayo kumdlalwane otsha owakhukhula.
FilmsPage.jurassicWorldFallenKingdomDescription: Isiqalo sokusindwa izixhobo zicale eziphakela umlilo lithwala amavumbu ashiyekile asebenziswa kwisikhalo.
FilmsPage.homefrontDescription: Umuntu othanda ipolisa acele ihlale emzini elincinci akumele akhanyelele uthando lwezidakamizela.
FilmsPage.spenserConfidentialDescription: Umuntu owayepolisa ubuyela ekhuphukeni ukuze akhanyelele abangani bakhe bahoswe, akhanyelele kumcimbi weBoston.
FilmsPage.centralIntelligenceDescription: Umuntu otsha othanda abakwi-CIA abuye esikoleni sakhe omkhulu amkhethile nomntu othanda abugebenga.
FilmsPage.vikingsDescription: Umuntu othanda uRagnar Lothbrok uphakamisela ukulwa azikala umuntu othanda kwaye ayisikali.
FilmsPage.aboutABoyDescription: Umuntu othanda iLondon uqalela abafazi abaphatshi abayehlule abangani akhanyelele umuntu omtsha onobusikela.
FilmsPage.peepShowDescription: Ubomi obungumele abantu ababheki befleti eJondon, okubikwa ngelinganiso lomdlalo okholo.
FilmsPage.theInbetweenersDescription: Abatsha abane abanobusikela akhanyelela isikali sezikali, abafazi, kunye nobusikela bawo.
FilmsPage.afterLifeDescription: Umuntu owongile umfazi akhanyelele ukuzisulela ulutshaba ngokwenza nangazo izinto ekufunela.
FilmsPage.derekDescription: Umuntu othanda abantu basemtholampilo abasilele kwi-nontuthuko yabantu abadala.
FilmsPage.theOfficeDescription: Iqela lesikhalo lithwala ubomi obungumele babasebenzisani bebhanki epakiti eSlough.
FilmsPage.badEducationDescription: Umfundisi othanda abantwana ohamba kwisikali elakhe eWatford akhanyelele abantwana bakhe.
FilmsPage.orangeIsTheNewBlackDescription: Umuntu othanda abantu owade ase-outside uza kulaphakela izikali zokufa emzini womuntu othanda.
FilmsPage.brooklynNinenineDescription: Umuntu othanda ipolisa kunye nalabo bakhe akhanyelele amacala amuntu eiBrooklyn.
FilmsPage.sexEducationDescription: Umuntu omtsha othanda ibhanki yakhe uyasikela isiko lesinye esikole esiyukhela.
FilmsPage.thisCountryDescription: Ibukiwe elinambili ezikali ezikhethekileyo abanqoba ubomi besilali eCotswolds.
FilmsPage.motherlandDescription: Isikali esixolwa ngokwenzela umuntu umkhulu endlela yabantu abatwana esikole.
FilmsPage.fridayNightDinnerDescription: Abantu abambili abakhanyelela umuzi wawo uLwesihlanu ebusuku ubusuku, apho izinto zabazisulela.
FilmsPage.benidormDescription: Iqela labantu abathanda iEurope aya eFespanya, Benidorm, akalala engcinezelo nengcinezelo.
FilmsPage.hatersBackOffDescription: Umuntu othanda abantu akhanyelela ukuba uma ethembekile, akhanyelele umuntu nomuntu.
FilmsPage.theJobLotDescription: Izinto ezitshiziswayo zabantu nabakhupha kumcimbi wesikolo.
FilmsPage.gavinStaceyDescription: Ibali lentshukumo lomuntu oEssex kunye nomuntu weWales akhanyelela abaphatshi bawo.
FilmsPage.outnumberedDescription: Abantu abambili abazifundisa akhanyelela abantwana bawo abahambelanayo.
FilmsPage.freshMeatDescription: Abantu abakhuphuka asisikholo eManchester akhanyelela ubomi besintu.
FilmsPage.theEndOfTheFingWorldDescription: Umuntu othanda abantu kunye nomuntu othanda abakhanyelela isikali esitshintshi.
FilmsPage.unbreakableKimmySchmidtDescription: Umuntu okhululekile kumkhondo wokuthwala abazilela ubomi obusha eNew York City.
FilmsPage.citizenKhanDescription: Umuntu othanda ikhomyuniti yeBirmingham yaminisithi yakhe akhanyelela umuntu nekhumbuzo.
FilmsPage.stepBrothersDescription: Abantu abambili abathanda izinto abahlule ngokuba bubatra emva kokuba abaphatshi bawo bakhawuluza.
FilmsPage.daddysHomeDescription: Umuntu othanda umsitane yakhe abuye amsikhulekela inkosikazi yokhululo yokubuka.
FilmsPage.daddysHome2Description: Abantu abambili akhanyelela izikali zawo abahlule ngokuba sibusuku seKristu.
FilmsPage.21JumpStreetDescription: Abapolisa abambili akhanyelela abasikweleni isikholo ukubulala umcimbi wezidakamizela.
FilmsPage.22JumpStreetDescription: Abapolisa abambili akhanyelela abasikweleni isikoli, kunye nomcimbi onwendlela.
FilmsPage.murderMysteryDescription: Umuntu othanda ipolisa kunye nomfazi wakhe aya eEuropa akumele akhanyelela umcimbi womuntu othanda.
FilmsPage.murderMystery2Description: Abantu abambili abakhanyelela umcimbi omusha okulwa nentshukumo kwenqela.
FilmsPage.theWrongMissyDescription: Umuntu othanda umuntu ongachanekanga akhanyelela izinto ezingeyintshukumo.
FilmsPage.thatsMyBoyDescription: Umuntu othanda umfazi wakhe abuya akhanyelela umwana wakhe omuntu othanda ebusukwini.
FilmsPage.grownUpsDescription: Abantu abahlanu akhanyelela ubusuku lwesine beKhrisimasi emva kokufa komntu othanda.
FilmsPage.grownUps2Description: Iqela linanziswayo likhanyelela abantwana bawo, abantu abahlanu, kunye nesikali seKhrisimasi.
FilmsPage.anchormanTheLegendOfRonBurgundyDescripti: Umuntu othanda isikhalo yesan Diego kawamashumi amane ubhukuqwe ngumuntu othanda.
FilmsPage.anchorman2TheLegendContinuesDescription: URon Burgundy kunye iqela lakhe lakhuthulwa ukuqala isikhalo sezikhalo zeshumi elinambili ewama-1980 eNew York.
FilmsPage.getHardDescription: Umuntu othanda ibhanki aqoka umuntu othanda umuntu othanda ezikali.
FilmsPage.identityThiefDescription: Umuntu othanda umuntu alandelela umuntu othanda ayibulale kuze abuye eFlorida kule Denver.
FilmsPage.dodgeballATrueUnderdogStoryDescription: Abantu abatshangisa akhanyelela umcimbi wobubeku ukuze bakusile igcina isikolo.
FilmsPage.norbitDescription: Umuntu othanda akhanyelela umuntu othanda umuntu othanda.
FilmsPage.hereComesTheBoomDescription: Umfundi wezikali akhanyelela ukulwa kwesandi ukuze akusile isikolo.
FilmsPage.chefDescription: Umuntu othanda ibhanki aqalela ibhanki yeqhitela kunye nomwana wakhe eAmerika.
FilmsPage.theInternshipDescription: Abantu abambili akhanyelela izikali zaGoogle akhangelekela abantu abatsha.
FilmsPage.dirtyGrandpaDescription: Umuntu othanda umlawu wakhe akhanyelela uFlorida besikali.
FilmsPage.paulBlartMallCopDescription: Umuntu othanda isikolo akhanyelela umcimbi womuntu othanda.
FilmsPage.paulBlartMallCop2Description: UPaul Blart aya eLas Vegas akhanyelela umcimbi wothando.
FilmsPage.bigHero6Description: Umuntu omtsha kunye nerobhothi akhanyelela ibhande lokusindwa idolobha.
FilmsPage.kungFuPandaDescription: UMpanda akhanyelela ukuqala amaqela esikhalo seselika.
FilmsPage.kungFuPanda2Description: UPo akhanyelela umkhondo wakhe kunye nothando olutsha.
FilmsPage.kungFuPanda3Description: UPo akhanyelela ubaphatshi bakhe kunye nothando olutsha.
FilmsPage.theLegoMovieDescription: Umuntu othanda Lego akhanyelela isikali sokubulala umuntu othanda.
FilmsPage.beeMovieDescription: Inyosi ethile akhanyelela umuntu othanda kwaye isikali somuntu othanda.
